courseDescription:
Imagine you’re applying for a new job. You look at your hard skills and think to yourself, “I can make a presentation so I’ll add ‘PowerPoint’ to my resumé.” Fast forward to the boardroom and you’re at the front. One person is asleep, another is confused and your boss is changing colours as they try to process how they feel about your awful presentation. You cast your mind back to that course you saw on Alison.com that you wanted to take in order to update your PowerPoint skills and then forgot. If only things could be different.

But wait, they still can! Don’t let this happen to you. Whether you use it often or not, mastery of PowerPoint is a useful hard skill for many professional occasions. This training course teaches you more than just basic transitions as it shows you how to really engage with your audience through compelling visuals. We explain how to customize the user interface to fit your needs and explore the program’s various available options.

Using Powerpoint means working with media, animation, video and audio - all components of an effective and interactive presentation. Develop the confidence to collaborate with others by saving and sharing via the web and impress your colleagues by showing them how to annotate a presentation and add hyperlinks. Don’t be the future version of you that missed out on this opportunity. Be the smart you that had everyone cheering you as you nailed that presentation. This Powerpoint training course teaches you everything you need to know to impress your future colleagues and get ahead.
